p: The IL (BMIM)(HQS) was synthesized in a two-step procedure as illustrated in Scheme 1: (1) quaternization of methylimidazole using butylchloride to produce 1-butyl-3-methylimidazolium chloride ((BMIM)(Cl)); (2) anion exchange reaction was carried out in methanol using a slightly excess of potassium hydroquinone sulfonate (1.15 eq.).
